Bacelius Ruru Jadi Dirut Agung Podomoro Land
05 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Tim detikcom


Ilustrasi Foto: dok. APL

Jakarta - Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa (RUPSLB) PT Agung Podomoro Land Tbk (APLN) menunjuk Bacelius Ruru sebagai direktur utama menggantikan Cosmas Batubara yang tutup usia pada 7 Agustus 2019 lalu.Dalam agenda RUPSLB, Selasa (5/11/2019), pemegang saham menyetujui seluruh agenda, salah satunya perombakan direksi dan komisaris.Bacelius Ruru, yang sebelumnya menjabat sebagai komisaris utama diangkat menjadi direktur utama emiten properti tersebut. Sementara, posisi komisaris utama yang sebelumnya dijabat Bacelius Ruru, digantikan Sofian Effendi."Efektif mulai hari, kita akan membawa perusahaan lebih baik lagi," kata Bacelius Ruru usai RUPSLB seperti dikutip dari CNBC Indonesia, Selasa (5/11/2019).Dengan demikian, berikut susunan komisaris dan direksi hasil RUPSLB:DireksiDirektur Utama: Bacelius RuruWakil Direktur Utama: Noer IndradjajaDirektur: Caesar M Dela CruzDirektur: Bambang SetiobudiDirektur: Miarni AngDirektur: Paul Christian AriyantoDirektur: Anak Agung Mas WirajayaKomisarisKomisaris Utama: Sofian EffendiKomisaris: Wibowo NgaserinLanjut ke halaman berikutnya untuk profil Bacelius Ruru >>> (ang/ang)

Bacelius Ruru Becomes Managing Director of Podomoro Land
05 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Tim detikcom


Photo Illustration: doc. APL

Jakarta - Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders (EGMS) of PT Agung Podomoro Land Tbk (APLN) appointed Bacelius Ruru as president director to replace Cosmas Batubara, who died at the end of August 7, 2019. In the EGMS agenda, Tuesday (11/05/2019), shareholders agreed on the entire agenda, one of which was the reshuffle of directors and commissioners. Bacelius Ruru, who previously served as president commissioner, was appointed as the managing director of the property issuer. Meanwhile, the position of chief commissioner previously held by Bacelius Ruru, was replaced by Sofian Effendi. "Effective from today, we will bring the company even better," Bacelius Ruru said after the EGMS as quoted by CNBC Indonesia, Tuesday (11/05/2019). thus, following the composition of commissioners and directors of the EGMS results: Board of Directors President Director: Bacelius Ruru Vice President Director: Noer Indradjaja Director: Caesar M Dela Cruz Director: Bambang Setiobudi Director: Miarni Ang Director: Paul Christian Ariyanto Director: Anak Agung Mas Wirajaya Commissioner Commissioner Commissioner: Sofin for the profile of Bacelius Ruru >>> (ang / ang)
